alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 20 at 6:16AM CST until January 21 at 9:37AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River near Amory For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Bigbee, Amory, Aberdeen L & D...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River near Amory. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM CST Thursday the stage was 19.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 20.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
